author: John
content: I'm a Windows guy, and while I own zero Apple products, and like it that way, you have to give Steve Jobs credit.  Because of him, Windows is a better operating system.  Whether or not Apple can survive without him remains to be seen.  It only took 12 years to bring Apple to the brink of disaster when Steve was "released" in '85.  They had to bring him back to survive.  Next few years could be interesting...
